body.p: The bearer of this letter is Sally White the sister ^of^ Hezekiah Alexander a free man of color who was sentenced to the Penitentiary from Meade County in July last.

Some time ago I sent to you a copy of the record in the case It clearly showed that the accused was convicted Contrary to law But I could not obtain an ap order of appeal because of the defect of the proceedings in this Circuit Court.
I must appeal to you in behalf of his sister and his aged father to pardon Hezekiah
Give him an opportunity of showing to you & to the world that he has been unjustly puneshed

His sister & Father display an
affection for him that adds dignity to human nature and on their account as well as on account of the unfortunate man I ask you to pardon him

Very respty
Yr obt servt
Nat Wolfe

Nat Wolfe
Hez. Alexander Case Peny --
